title: A common-place book to the Holy Bible or, The scriptures sufficiency practically demonstrated wherein whatsoever is contain'd in scripture, respecting doctrine, worship, or manners, is reduced to its proper head, weighty cases resolved, truths confirmed, difficult texts illustrated, and explained by others more plain.
author: Locke, John, 1632-1704.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by Edw. Jones, for Awnsham and John Churchil ...,
